name: Whorl
description:
You are a poor mining ship traveling through dangerous space, at the mercy of an onslaught of enemies - but you have no weapons! Draw loops around your foes' firepower to give them a taste of their own medicine. Struggle to survive against procedurally generated waves of enemies.

Made for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam. The theme was Stuck in a Loop.

Made by a group of 4 in a custom engine built with SFML:

  • Horus Vidal
  • Andrew Advani
  • Alex Pacheco
  • Daniel Muzkiz (Biohazard335)

-----

Controls are:

-Keyboard + Mouse WASD to move LShift to slow down Space to draw

-Gamepad Left Stick to move X (left face button) to slow down A (bottom face button) to draw
